it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model

Interface Model

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observer<ModelUpdate>, Remote, RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModelImpl

    public interface Model
extends Observer<ModelUpdate>
    Top-level class for the model package. It provides access to the match and holds the players before match creation. The model observes the match for ModelUpdates and so it receives all the updates, which then get sent (routed) to the correct views
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObserver(String username, RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate> observer)
      Subscribe given observer to all events addressed to the specified username.
      Match getMatch()
      Returns match instance associated to this model.
      MatchOperationalState getOperationalState()
      Returns the operational state of the match
      void notifyObservers(Collection<String> recipients, ModelUpdate event)
      Sends the event to the observers of the recipients (i.e. calls Observer.update(Object) on them).
      void notifyObservers(ModelUpdate event)
      Sends the event to all the observers, regardless of the usernames they subscribed to.
      void notifyObservers(String username, ModelUpdate event)
      Sends the event to the observers of the username (i.e. calls Observer.update(Object) on them).
      void removeAllObservers(String username)
      Unsubscribe all observers for a specific username.
      void removeObserver(String username, RemoteObserver observer)
      Unsubscribe given observer from events addressed to given username.
      void sendInitialUpdate(String username)
      Sends the model update with all the match status (aka initial update) to the specified player
      void setMatch(Match match)
      Sets the internal instance to the match
      void setOperationalState(MatchOperationalState state)
      Sets the operational state of the match
      void suspendPlayer(String username)
      Suspends a player if the player exists and the match has been created, otherwise it does nothing
      void unsuspendPlayer(String username)
      Unsuspends a player if it has been suspended If the player does not exist or if it wasn't suspended, nothing happens

    • Method Detail

      • setMatch

        void setMatch(Match match)
        Sets the internal instance to the match
        Parameters:
        match - the match to be set

      • getMatch

        Match getMatch()
        Returns match instance associated to this model.
        Returns:
        match instance

      • suspendPlayer

        void suspendPlayer(String username)
        Suspends a player if the player exists and the match has been created, otherwise it does nothing
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the player to be suspended

      • unsuspendPlayer

        void unsuspendPlayer(String username)
        Unsuspends a player if it has been suspended If the player does not exist or if it wasn't suspended, nothing happens
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the player to be suspended

      • getOperationalState

        MatchOperationalState getOperationalState()
        Returns the operational state of the match
        Returns:
        the operational state of the match

        void setOperationalState(MatchOperationalState state)
        Sets the operational state of the match
        Parameters:

      • sendInitialUpdate

        void sendInitialUpdate(String username)
        Sends the model update with all the match status (aka initial update) to the specified player
        Parameters:
        username - username of the player

      • addObserver

        void addObserver(String username,
                 RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate> observer)
        Subscribe given observer to all events addressed to the specified username.
        Parameters:
        username - username for routing
        observer - observer to be subscribed

      • removeObserver

        void removeObserver(String username,
                    RemoteObserver observer)
        Unsubscribe given observer from events addressed to given username. If the given pair does not exist, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        username - username for routing
        observer - observer to be unsubscribed

      • removeAllObservers

        void removeAllObservers(String username)
        Unsubscribe all observers for a specific username. If an observer is subscribed to different usernames, it will be kept on the other usernames. If the username does not exist, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        username - username whose observers must be removed

      • notifyObservers

        void notifyObservers(String username,
                     ModelUpdate event)
        Sends the event to the observers of the username (i.e. calls Observer.update(Object) on them).
        Parameters:
        username - username for routing
        event - event to be sent

      • notifyObservers

        void notifyObservers(Collection<String> recipients,
                     ModelUpdate event)
        Sends the event to the observers of the recipients (i.e. calls Observer.update(Object) on them). If an observers is subscribed to more than one username, it will only be notified once.
        Parameters:
        recipients - collection of usernames whose observers will received the event
        event - event to be sent

      • notifyObservers

        void notifyObservers(ModelUpdate event)
        Sends the event to all the observers, regardless of the usernames they subscribed to. If an observers is subscribed to more than one username, it will only be notified once.
        Parameters:
        event - event to be sent
